ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECTRT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: ECTRT is the name of the intervention or treatment known to the subject and/or administrator and it is the SDTM topic variable. It is a required variable in SDTM and must have a value in CDASH or a plan to populate it in the SDTM submission datasets (i.e. collected or populated from other sources). In a masked study, if treatment is collected and known as Tablet A to the subject or administrator, then ECTRT='TABLET A'. If in a masked study the treatment is not known by a synonym and the data are to be exchanged between sponsors, partners and/or regulatory agency(s), then assign ECTRT the value of 'MASKED'.
